grading.en:
“Evaluation: Failed (final scores below 60)
Midterms: 55％ (Every Four Chapters); Final: 40％ (10 whole Chapters: 1-10); Report: 5％ (Journal Studies, 1-2 pages discussion)
Handouts, Study Materials and Class information: On BlackBoard“
